Plot: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.
Title: Chapter 27
Writer: J.P. Schaefer, Jack Jones (inspired by the book "Let Me Take You Down")
Actors: Chuck Cooper, Victor Verhaeghe, Robert Gerard Larkin, Lindsay Lohan
tomatoConsensus: Despite Jared Leto's committed performance, Chapter 27 fails to penetrate to mind of Mark David Chapman, John Lennon's killer.
